item.title: A 170-Mile Trek Across the Arctic to Highlight Climate Change
item.description:
A 170-Mile Trek Across the Arctic to Highlight Climate Change

University of Minnesota professor Aaron Doering joins Lunch Break with Tanya Rivero from Arctic Bay, Canada in the midst of a 170-mile journey across Canada and the Arctic to promote awareness of rapid environmental changes facing the region. Photo: Aaron Doering / LT Media Lab

item.title: Bamboo Architecture
item.description:
Bamboo Architecture

BALI, Indonesia-How do you build a future out of grass? On the Indonesian island of Bali, one organization has set out to do just that. Ibuku, an architecture and furniture design firm based outside of Denpasar, Bali's capital, is using Dendrocalamus asper bamboo-or petung in Balinese-to construct Green Village.I had the chance to visit this innovative new community while on leave from my Fulbright National Geographic Fellowship in Japan.

item.title: These Designers Invented A New Way To 3-D Print Concrete Architecture
item.description:
These Designers Invented A New Way To 3-D Print Concrete Architecture

While studying together at the Bartlett School of Architecture, masters students Francesca Camilleri, Nadia Doukhi, Alvaro Lopez Rodriguez and Roman Strukov all agreed that 3-D printing was the future of their chosen trade.

item.title: Tesla Model 3 exclusive leaked specs: 0-60 under 4 sec fast and 300+ mile range options (Update: Base 6 sec 0-60 and 215 mile range)
item.description:
Tesla Model 3 exclusive leaked specs: 0-60 under 4 sec fast and 300+ mile range options (Update: Base 6 sec 0-60 and 215 mile range)

Update: Tesla has now announced specs for the base model which will be 215 mile range and a 0-60 time of under 6 seconds. We're about 24 hours away from the Model 3 unveil and it's time for everyone to show their cards.

item.title: Tesla and SolarCity Agree to $2.6 Billion Merger Deal
item.description:
Tesla and SolarCity Agree to $2.6 Billion Merger Deal

Tesla Motors Inc. on Monday said it had reached a deal to buy SolarCity Corp., combining Elon Musk's electric-car and solar-energy companies. The all-stock deal values SolarCity at about $2.6 billion. SolarCity stockholders will receive 0.11 shares of Tesla for each SolarCity share, valuing them at $25.83 apiece, according to Friday's closing...

item.title: This Solar-Powered Engine Can Be Made With A 3D Printer
item.description:
This Solar-Powered Engine Can Be Made With A 3D Printer

You can 3D print plenty of things these days, from candy to a model of an asteroid. And now, with the help of a 3D printer, you can produce most of the parts for a pretty simple engine. Recently, German engineer Andreas Haeuser built a solar-powered Stirling engine using almost entirely 3D printed parts.

item.title: No title
NASA's 3D-Printed Rocket Engine Spews Fire and 20,000 Pounds of Thrust
item.description:
NASA's 3D-Printed Rocket Engine Spews Fire and 20,000 Pounds of Thrust

This NASA rocket is, bewilderingly, mainly built from 3D-printed parts. And yet pumped full of liquid hydrogen and oxygen it spews flame and generates an insane 20,000 pounds of thrust. NASA has been developing 3D-printed rocket engines for a while now.

item.title: Parts Of Persian Gulf Could Be Too Hot For Humans By Century's End
item.description:
Parts Of Persian Gulf Could Be Too Hot For Humans By Century's End

WASHINGTON (AP) - If carbon dioxide emissions continue at their current pace, by the end of century parts of the Persian Gulf will sometimes be just too hot for the human body to tolerate, a new study says. How hot?

item.title: Montreal to lead the way with downtown curbside electric car charging stations, mayor says
item.description:
Montreal to lead the way with downtown curbside electric car charging stations, mayor says

Montreal and the province of Quebec have unveiled plans to install 106 charging stations for electric cars around the city by next spring. Mayor Denis Coderre says Montreal will be a leader among Canadian cities. He said having curbside stations downtown will make Montreal stand out.
